text:
Hi everyone, I am working on the CMS for Developers Practicum and I am stuck at this stage:
• Creating a Repeating Fields Module for the "Our Team" section.
I created a new Module, added images, grouped them together and set them to "Repeating."
• The problem is that no code appears when I make this Module. And the Preview of this Module shows as blank.
I made a quick Screen Recording of the empty code and blank preview link: *<https://www.loom.com/share/17153d5281e64e1483a321c5984c7bb9>*

I cannot find any resources to complete this task successfully. I'm grateful for any assistance! Thank you!
Hi Tracy if I understand your issue correctly once you have your group and have turned on the repeater and stated the default amount you set and then grab the code and put it on the page.
When you building out your properties you still need to inject them into your html.
Thank you Thomas! This was a huge help.
